name: Band of Free Folk
text: Discard Band of Free Folk from play any time there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play. While there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play, Band of Free Folk cannot be killed and gains a [power] icon and stealth

name: âˆž Old Bear's Crow
text: Setup. Attached character gains renown. Any phase: move Old Bear's Crow to a different character (limit once per phase). Dominance: kneel 2 influence to attach Old Bear's Crow to a character you control. Use this ability only while Old Bear's Crow is in your discard pile.

name: No Peace in Westeros
text: Dominance: kneel 1 influence to choose and kill 2 characters, each with a different House affiliation, controlled by the same player.
